mentionedBy.name: CrowdStrike Holdings Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Unified cybersecurity platform combining EDR with extended detection and response capabilities and telemetry across enterprise email, cloud, and networks. Good for holistic visibility beyond just endpoint-centric focus.

mentionedBy.name: SentinelOne Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: XDR platform collecting and correlating deep activity data across email, endpoints, servers, cloud workloads, and networks. Enables detection and investigation difficult or impossible with SIEM or individual point solutions. Strong multi-vector visibility.
